Package se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification

Class ShowSimplified

java.lang.Object
se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.AbstractModelObject
se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification.ShowSimplified
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IModelObject, ISearchModelObject
public class ShowSimplified extends AbstractModelObject implements ISearchModelObject
Retrieve information about simplified Show objects by building instances from this class.
See Also:

      public Boolean getExplicit()
      Check whether the show is explicit or not.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the show has explicit content (true = yes it does; false = no it does not OR unknown).

      Returns:

      Check whether the show is hosted outside of Spotify's CDN.
      Returns:
